Text: thank you very much. have been tracking down the warlord of mars series. where does this fit in the series? so many of them. thanks again.
This is the first book of the series.

Google filetype cbr will show you these results, among others:

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Comic_Book_Archive_file 


http://www.google.com/search?q=cbr&ie=utf-8&oe=utf-8&aq=t&rls=org.mozilla:en-US:official&client=firefox-a#hl=en&client=firefox-a&hs=x8Y&rls=org.mozilla:en-US%3Aofficial&sclient=psy-ab&q=filetype+cbr&oq=filetype+cbr&aq=f&aqi=g-s1g-bs1&aql=&gs_sm=3&gs_upl=12420l14772l0l14978l9l9l0l0l0l0l93l757l9l9l0&gs_l=serp.3..0i10j0i8i10.12420l14772l0l14979l9l9l0l0l0l0l93l757l9l9l0.frgbld&pbx=1&bav=on.2,or.r_gc.r_pw.r_qf.,cf.osb&fp=2184f7f98b220f0b&biw=1600&bih=669

You need a comic book reader (CBR). Wiki above has links to several.
Does anyone have the collected Black and White version of this series?  Would love to get some of the b&w reprints of this and some of the Marvel Essentials as they would be cleaner on a reader.
Download the Free and Amazing software ComicRack to read Comic files (CBR/CBZ)
